about_the_game:
Description

Step into the world of TurretFall, where strategic decisions, quick thinking and adaptiveness are key to survival. This roguelite tower defense game challenges you to build and manage a formidable structure, balancing research and economy to fend off relentless waves of enemies. Easy to learn but difficult to master, TurretFall offer bite-size yet intense runs, blending the best of roguelite and tower defense mechanics. Will you focus on advancing your technology, your economic power or simply go all out in firepower? The choice is yours, but beware—your turrets won’t last long without a steady supply of ammo.

Key Features

  • Defend Against Relentless Waves: Protect your structures from increasingly challenging enemy waves.
  • Epic Boss Battles: Face off against powerful bosses that will test your strategic prowess and adaptability.
  • Dynamic Runs: No two runs are the same—collect research cards or tower upgrades, and adapt your strategy on the fly.
  • Strategic Resource Management: Power your structure, manage resources, and keep your turrets supplied with ammo to survive the onslaught.
